previews.question: What are some good study habits for college students?
previews.hot_response: Good study habits for college students include setting goals, creating a study schedule, taking breaks, and practicing active recall.
previews.author: study_guru

previews.question: How do I manage my time effectively in college?
previews.hot_response: To manage your time effectively in college, you should prioritize your tasks, break them down into smaller chunks, and use tools like calendars and to-do lists to stay organized.
previews.author: time_management_pro

previews.question: What are some healthy meal options for college students on a budget?
previews.hot_response: Healthy meal options for college students on a budget include oatmeal, eggs, peanut butter, fruits and vegetables, and whole grain bread.
previews.author: healthy_eating_expert

previews.question: How can I improve my public speaking skills?
previews.hot_response: To improve your public speaking skills, you should practice, prepare, and focus on your body language and tone of voice.
previews.author: public_speaking_pro

previews.question: What are some effective stress management techniques for college students?
previews.hot_response: Effective stress management techniques for college students include exercise, deep breathing, mindfulness meditation, and getting enough sleep.
previews.author: stress_management_guru
